title: "testing packages" hangs on golang 1.6 osx 10.6
body:
go version go1.5.3 darwin/amd64
os: OSX 10.6.8

When running all.bash for golang 1.6, go builds but hangs in testing packages. The last printed message is:
`ok  	mime/quotedprintable	0.370s``

After some 10s the cpu usage frops to zero but nothing else happens.

Killing the process after 10 min leaves an invisible "net.test" and a visible "go" process active. With invisible I mean not visible in `top` and `Activity Monitor`.
